# Taskade

> Taskade is a real-time collaborative productivity platform with AI-powered agents, automated workflows, and a no-code app builder called Taskade Genesis.

Taskade lets teams collaborate on projects, create AI agents, automate workflows, and build complete business applications from natural language descriptions.

## Core Features

- **Taskade Genesis**: No-code app builder that creates complete business applications from natural language prompts. Generates databases, AI agents, automations, and public web interfaces.
- **Space Apps**: Complete React web applications with live URLs, custom domains, and mobile-responsive design. Built through Taskade Genesis.
- **AI Agents**: Customizable AI assistants with configurable knowledge bases, tools, and multi-agent collaboration capabilities.
- **Automations**: 100+ service integrations (Slack, Gmail, HubSpot, Stripe, etc.) with trigger-action workflows, AI forms, and workflow generator.
- **Projects & Workspaces**: Real-time collaborative workspaces with multiple views (list, board, table, mind map, org chart), markdown support, and knowledge management.
